summary: A small hidden hideout not far from Rorikstead
descriptionHtml:
Description
===================

Ok, basically, when I was looking for a hideout I had the following requirements for it in mind:

i. It has to be a secret hideout and thus have a secret entrance
ii. Must be far away enough from any town, road, or warzone (Civil Unrest mod) so that it is not easily discovered, but at the same time have a central location in Skyrim 
iii. Must be very simple, small, cosy, realistic and natural
iv. Must not be under a waterfall, because who wants to get soaking wet every time when entering. Or am I supposed to hold my shield up like an umbrella?

Unfortunately I couldn\'t find a mod that complied with all of these criteria so I decided to make my own simple hideout that did, and since it is now done, I might as well release it to the public.

This is probably the smallest hideout for Skyrim and is meant for temporary use.

I am also making something more substantial as another hideout.

Installation
====================
Put file into Skyrim\'s data folder and turn the mod on through data files menu at startup - or whatever your usual way to install is.


Location
====================

The map location of the hideout is in the screenshots, but you may have to look closer to find the entrance. 


Suggested mods
====================
Any visual mod that makes Skyrim shadows darker, else the atmosphere inside just won\'t be the same :)


Bugs
====================
There shouldn\'t be any bugs, but I noticed that occasionally some dead Stormcloak or imperial items ends up spawning near the entrance marker. Not sure if that has to do with this mod.
author: Jedo
